text: to unhonne kahaah he hamaare paalanahaar! dooree[1] karade hamaaree yaatraon ke beech tatha unhonne atyaachaar kiya apane oopar. antatah, hamane unhen kahaaniyaan[2] bana diya aur tittar-vittar kar diya. vaastav mein, isamen kaee nishaaniyaan (shikshaayen) hain pratyek ati dhairyavaan, krtagy ke lie
